pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stanford 'CoreNLP' Annotation Client // Stanford 'CoreNLP' annotation client. Stanford 'CoreNLP' https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/index.html integrates all NLP tools from the Stanford Natural Language Processing Group, including a part-of-speech (POS) tagger, a named entity recognizer (NER), a parser, and a coreference resolution system, and provides model files for the analysis of English. More information can be found in the README.
